footer.tagline: Digital engineering that creates momentum—not friction.
footer.copyright: © {year} IE Global, Inc. All rights reserved.

strategy.title: Build the right thing. Not just anything.
strategy.subtitle: We align technology with your business goals, clarify what matters, and design a roadmap you can trust.

websites.title: High-performance digital experiences, built to last.
websites.subtitle: We design and develop websites, platforms, and internal systems that feel fast, intuitive, and reliable.

data.title: Your systems, finally connected.
data.subtitle: We integrate your tools, automate workflows, and apply practical AI - so your business moves smarter, not harder.

partnership.title: We don't just build. We stay.
partnership.subtitle: Ongoing performance reviews, improvements, scaling support, security - a relationship that grows with your business.

home.weBuildYourWebsiteDesc: Whether you have an existing site to rebuild or need one from scratch—we help. Request templates or get in touch to start.
home.templateRequestSubtitle: Enter your details and we'll get in touch and send you our templates.
home.templateRequestSuccessDesc: We've received your request and will email our templates shortly.
home.templateRequestError: Something went wrong. Please try again or email hello@ie-global.net.
home.builtForPerformanceDesc: We design, build, and operate high-performance digital systems—websites, apps, and platforms—engineered to scale smoothly and evolve with your business.
home.buildFastDesc: We ship modern, intuitive, high-performance experiences that feel fast everywhere—mobile, web, and internal tools included.
home.scaleSmoothlyDesc: We architect systems that integrate cleanly and grow with your needs, from APIs and workflows to cloud environments and deployment pipelines.
home.operateReliablyDesc: We stay with you after launch, continuously improving performance, security, and functionality as your business evolves.
home.behindTheCode: Where clarity meets code. Every system we build starts with understanding—and ends with impact.
home.measurableOutcomesLead: Engineering isn't just about shipping—it's about impact.
home.measurableOutcomesDesc: Your digital systems should create momentum—not friction. We measure success in business outcomes, not just technical metrics.
home.performanceGains: Performance gains you can feel—and measure.
home.recentWorkDesc: Real projects. Real outcomes. Real impact.
home.ctaDesc: Have a complex stack or ambitious growth target? We turn it into a fast, connected, intelligent system.
